dialogues.text: Obstacle detected: A pit with hazardous spikes. Falling is not recommended.
Distance calculated. Probability of success: high, assuming basic competence.
You are welcome. Precision is advised. Falling will result in failure, followed by death. Remember to alter trajectory mid-air.
Scans indicate similar pits ahead. Hold the jump key for a longer amount of time for more height. This is important information.
